Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Avanti International Resort in Orlando (International Drive), you'll be minutes from Pirate's Cove Adventure Golf and I-Drive 360. This family-friendly hotel is close to SeaWorld® Orlando and Universal Studios Florida®.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 652 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms feature bathtubs or showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include coffee/tea makers and irons/ironing boards, as well as phones with free local calls.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including wireless Internet access (surcharge) and an arcade/game room. If you're planning a day at a nearby theme park, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge).

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a computer station, and a 24-hour front desk. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 4 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or grab a snack at a coffee shop/café. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The preferred airport for Avanti International Resort is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 16 km / 10 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Econo Lodge Inn and Suites is Orlando, FL (MCO-Orlando Intl.) - 16.2 km / 10.1 mi.
